A User’s Guide to Stellar CCD Photometry with Python¶

This document is a guide to performing stellar photometry on CCD data using photutils, an astropy affiliated package.

It follows the same steps outlined in Massey & Lindsey’s A User’s Guide to Stellar CCD Photometry with IRAF (1992).
